about_the_game:
Ever wanted to take a ridiculously fast, fully-controllable rocket ship and fly it like the lunatic that lives inside of all of us? Well now you can!

Fly Dangerous is a game where 60Gs of acceleration is just fine because who needs realism? From pick-up and play arcade gamepad all the way to no-assist, highly configurable and bind-able controls - configure your flight stick (or mouse, keyboard, gamepad or ... steering wheel, no judgements here but good luck) and take to the skies at absurd speeds.

Test your skill on the leaderboards with drift, careful boost control and a 6dof flight model! Use flight assists to keep your balance and work towards turning them off for the best times!

Put some music on and chill in the infinite free roam modes.

Party up with friends in the online multiplayer mode!

Jump into VR for the full stomach-wrenching experience!

Now supports head tracking with OpenTrack and TrackIR, bHaptics integration and telemetry / Sim Racing Studio integration!

Forever free and open source

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS, Ubuntu 18.04+, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Quad core x86/64 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ GPU with 3GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR is not supported on Linux. Infinite terrain generation benefits linearly with more cores

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Quad core x86/64 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Whatever metal gpu apple gives you
  • Additional Notes: VR is not supported on macOS. Infinite terrain generation benefits linearly with more cores

name: Fly Dangerous

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: Quad core x86/64 CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10+ Capable GPU with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR. Keyboard or gamepad required
  • Additional Notes: Infinite terrain generation benefits linearly with more cores
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
